TopicTitle: Massive FPS drop while EVA on mun

Articles.Content: I went EVA on the mun and it was fine until I hit one point and the frame rate dropped dramatically to literally less than 1 frame per second. I have one small vehicle on the mun with maybe 60 parts so am very confused what’s causing this. Makes it unplayable

4 hours ago, Joe W said:

I went EVA on the mun and it was fine until I hit one point and the frame rate dropped dramatically to literally less than 1 frame per second. I have one small vehicle on the mun with maybe 60 parts so am very confused what’s causing this. Makes it unplayable 

I heard that flags cause the problem

On 7/31/2019 at 7:31 AM, Joe W said:

I went EVA on the mun and it was fine until I hit one point and the frame rate dropped dramatically to literally less than 1 frame per second. I have one small vehicle on the mun with maybe 60 parts so am very confused what’s causing this. Makes it unplayable 

Delete any flags you have planted in the tracking station before loading into your ship. If there's a flag in view, it's going to morph into a strange modern art sculpture with too many polygons to render cleanly. Once the flags are gone, things should return to relatively normal.
